entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 01:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: WSW 69 km/h gust 86 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of snow squalls. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
